title: News reports from France. [No. 70/59] = Chroniques de France
creator_contributor_role: La Societe Nouvelle Pathe-Cinema, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns - France
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Gardens - France
description: Cinemagazine: 1. La Rochelle - La Rochelle, 70,000 inhabitants, trade and fishing port, tourist resort, on the Atlantic coast. 2. Claude Nougaro - Annecy, one spring evening...a halt in Claude Nougaro's singing tour. 3. France and the horse - In our mechanical universe, the horse brings us back to nature. 4. The charm of the Palais Royal - In the heart of Paris, between the Opera and the Louvre, an oasis of peace and haven of silence, the garden of the Palais Royal.
